TEXT.TITLE: DSC COMMUNICATIONS<DIGI.O> IN SUPPLY AGREEMENT
TEXT.BODY: DSC Communications Corp said it signed a supply agreement with United Telephone System Inc to deliver DSC Signal Transfer Points valued at about 3.0 mln dlrs. It said the agreement runs through 1990 with product deliveries expected to start later this year. Reuter
